summary: SummaryMEDIHEAL Vitamide Brightening Pad delivers a radiance boost while helping to fight blemishes, leaving skin looking bright and clear.
details: DetailsBenefitsOur liposome delivery system provides rapid and deep absorption, improving skin's tone and luminosityImproves ruddy skin tone by 58%, dull skin tone by 10%, sallow skin tone by 15%Improves visible blemishes by 15%, hidden blemishes by 16%Features100% cotton fabric padPad stretches for a custom fitSized (2.6") to cover a wide areaRounded corners for the perfect fitKey IngredientsNiacinamide 3%: Evens skin toneSea Buckthorn: Brightens, high in Vitamin C with more Vitamin C than an orange7 Sources of Essential Vitamins: Brightens and adds radiance to skin with different forms of vitamins, including RetinolItem 2626998How To UseAs a treatment mask: Apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into skin.As a treatment pad: After cleansing, gently swipe across skin to tone, moisturize and prep skin. Can be used daily both in the AM and PM.IngredientsWater, Dipropylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Glycereth-26, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hippophae Rhamnoides Water, Hydroxyacetophenone, Betaine, Octyldodeceth-16, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Allantoin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Trehalose, Xanthan Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Disodium EDTA, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Riboflavin, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Pyridoxine HCL, Retinol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Menadione, Thiamine HCL, Citronellol, Linalool, Geraniol, Limonene.
how_to_use: As a treatment mask: Apply on targeted areas (forehead, cheeks and chin) after cleansing for an intensive treatment. Leave on for 15 minutes, remove and let the remaining serum absorb into skin.As a treatment pad: After cleansing, gently swipe across skin to tone, moisturize and prep skin. Can be used daily both in the AM and PM.

reviews.headline: I like it
reviews.comments: Its pretty good but dont travel with it anywhere becuase it WILL spill everywhere. Also the hook for the spatula doesnt really sork but the product itself is pretty nice!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Easy to use and versatile as a mask or quick swipe. Plus actually seems to work?!

reviews.headline: GOBSMACKED!
reviews.comments: I noticed the difference in my skin after one use! I think I found my new holy Grail product. You can stretch the pads into a custom fit as well, but pregnant women be careful as this does contain retinol.

reviews.headline: Works
reviews.comments: It works well. But, i cant use it often because the smell makes me sick.

reviews.headline: love it !
reviews.comments: definitely worth the price and i have actually repurchased the refill for this as well!! i never had a product give me a noticeable change like this before. my skin has gotten brighter and faded my acne scars, i use this both am and pm, even will leave it on my skin as a face mask while i do my hair. wish ulta would carry more from this brand.

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: I've had the same dark spots for years that I just couldn't seem to get rid of. I tried this product with the combination of another one plus religiously applying sunscreen and my skin truly hasn't been more even. I say improvements within days.

reviews.headline: Caused breakout
reviews.comments: I really want to like this product but the breakouts its causing is frustrating. I tried slowly integrating them into my routine but didnt matter, I continued to breakout. The Mediheal blue for acne is very nice and helped with my problem.

reviews.headline: Nice product
reviews.comments: I like it, didn't tingle, burn or break me out which is the most important thing to me. I haven't noticed any crazy brightening changes on my skin yet but it's super hydrating and it feels nice on the skin. One con is that the pads are super thin and one isn't enough to wipe across the face.

reviews.headline: Effective skin pads
reviews.comments: I live using skin pads like these. Have previously tried the Lazy Day pads by Peach and Lily, and love those but a but pricey. Ive tried other rands as well and liked them all. But these are the best i have ever used! They are a bit different than other brands in that they are thinner - but its more serum based and ive found more effective! After you wipe, leave them sitting on your skin while getting ready. They are like mini sheet masks. It makes my skin soft, reduces fine lines, and brightens. I will definitley repurucase!

reviews.headline: Love these!
reviews.comments: I started using these Monday, before I went into work on night shift. By last night, Wednesday, only three days/uses later, I receieved SO MANY compliment on how radiant my skin was. They speak for themselves, honestly.

reviews.headline: Would buy again!
reviews.comments: My skin has noticeably smoothened out and I am having little to no acne and my skin is very clear

reviews.headline: Still trying to decide
reviews.comments: I have only used this product for a few weeks now. I have noticed it leaves my face softer without drying or irritation. I appreciate system and easy it is to take the cloths from its compact container.

reviews.headline: Such a great product!
reviews.comments: I tried this product for my AM skincare routine and the results are amazing. I have normal sensitive skin and this does not irritate it at all. Within a week of consistent use my skin was brighter and more even. After a few weeks I literally have a bit of a glass skin effect without any products when I wake up in the morning. Your mileage may vary with this product but for me it gave the best immediate and lasting results of any treatment product I've personally tried.

reviews.headline: Broke me out
reviews.comments: I wamted to like these so bad. I have sensitive dry skin. Started using thesw daily and I broke out with white heads all over my face.

reviews.headline: Does the job and more
reviews.comments: I bought this to helo with brightening of the skin and the eye and I've seen results in four weeks of usage. I love this stuff, it's brightening and makes your skin look healthy and alive.

reviews.headline: O M G... One of the best things I've tried!
reviews.comments: Coming from someone who hasn't changed their skincare routine in over a year. The very FIRST pad I used from this I could already tell a difference in my moisture. It has really been a game changer, as I've been searching for moisturizing products to help my dark spots & dryness subside. I am unsure of my skin type, but it gets dry extremely with no kind of moisturizer but would also get overly oily throughout the day to the point where it would itch and I would get cystic pimples, this product has not given me any irritation or itchiness at all! I will definitely be keeping this in my routine.

reviews.headline: Skin care
reviews.comments: Love !

reviews.headline: The strawberry dots are disappearing before my eyes.
reviews.comments: 10/10. This is literally changing my life. I started using them after the shower. I wipe my body dry. Them wipe with these on my legs. Theyre tiny so i need a few. Literally within weeks, there are PATCHES of clear skin on my legs. Nothing has ever worked before. I need them to make sheets of this product, because I am now using them all over my body after a shower. I feel my confidence coming back. My husband was like ðŸ˜³ when i showed him the progress. Every day i cant wait to look at my legs and look for new clear patches lol

reviews.headline: Reaction
reviews.comments: I didn't consider myself as having sensitive but it broke me out a lotâ€¦many small red bumps. It took over a week to clear:((. I even gave it a second chance. Also,I tried to give them to someone else but they had a reaction as well.

reviews.headline: Will be buying again!
reviews.comments: Only used the pads for 3 days and have already seen improvements in my skin. Its brighter and my pores are less visible.

faceoff_positive.comments: Coming from someone who hasn't changed their skincare routine in over a year. The very FIRST pad I used from this I could already tell a difference in my moisture. It has really been a game changer, as I've been searching for moisturizing products to help my dark spots & dryness subside. I am unsure of my skin type, but it gets dry extremely with no kind of moisturizer but would also get overly oily throughout the day to the point where it would itch and I would get cystic pimples, this product has not given me any irritation or itchiness at all! I will definitely be keeping this in my routine.

faceoff_negative.comments: I really want to like this product but the breakouts its causing is frustrating. I tried slowly integrating them into my routine but didnt matter, I continued to breakout. The Mediheal blue for acne is very nice and helped with my problem.
